name: pareto-api
description: the API interface definitions for the pareto package

scripts.pubMin: git diff --exit-code && git push && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && rd /s /q .\dist && tsc && npm run lint && npm run test && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: git diff --exit-code && git push && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && rd /s /q .\dist && tsc && npm run lint && npm run test && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: echo there is nothing to test, this package only defines an API

author: corno
